  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void barrier()
    creates a solid fixture in barriershape with barrier image that lasts 10s and then destroys it increments boss' life count in the process, removes immunity while destroying barirer; method is called by shootBarrier method
    void doThings()
    collective method of all methods to be done depending on which level boss is in also changes body image, set's constant immunity in level 11 and changes gravity scale
    int getEyeCount()
    returns current eyecount
    int getLife()
    returns lives of the boss
    org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 getPos()
    gets current position of the boss
    void gotHit​(int q)
    takes value from set life and changes lives by that value if lives under 0 calls for wonBoss if else displays a message checks if immunity is applied and ignores the damage if it is
    boolean isImmune()
    returns if boss is curently immune to attacks
    void itWalks()
    randomises boss' movement changing speed, gravity scale and applying jump; each change is controlled by random number generator and timer.
    void setEyeCount​(int e)
    sets eyecount during the fight in level 11 calls wonBoss if satisfied
    void setImmune​(boolean immune)
    sets boss' immunity
    void setLife​(int l)
    calls gotHit method
    void setLollipopCount​(int i)  
    void setSpeed​(int speed)
    changes speed of the movement of the boss
    void shootBarrier()
    controls calling method barrier() in intervals of 11,5-15,5s, applies immunity
    void shootCurse()
    controls spawning instances of CurseCast positioned at the current position of the Hero uses timer and randomised times 11-15s
    void shootHeel()
    controls spawning Heel attacks at the Hero using positioning() method uses timer at random intervals 2-3,5 s
    void shootSpell()
    like shootHeel() shoots BossSpell attacks at hero using positioning() method every 1-2,9s
    void turned​(boolean b)  
    void wonBoss()
    method controls moving to the next level upon winning the fight

      changes speed of the movement of the boss

    • doThings

      public void doThings()
      collective method of all methods to be done depending on which level boss is in also changes body image, set's constant immunity in level 11 and changes gravity scale

    • gotHit

      public void gotHit​(int q)
      takes value from set life and changes lives by that value if lives under 0 calls for wonBoss if else displays a message checks if immunity is applied and ignores the damage if it is
      Parameters:
      q - value taken from setLives

    • barrier

      public void barrier()
      creates a solid fixture in barriershape with barrier image that lasts 10s and then destroys it increments boss' life count in the process, removes immunity while destroying barirer; method is called by shootBarrier method

    • shootBarrier

      public void shootBarrier()
      controls calling method barrier() in intervals of 11,5-15,5s, applies immunity

    • shootCurse

      public void shootCurse()
      controls spawning instances of CurseCast positioned at the current position of the Hero uses timer and randomised times 11-15s

    • shootHeel

      public void shootHeel()
      controls spawning Heel attacks at the Hero using positioning() method uses timer at random intervals 2-3,5 s

    • shootSpell

      public void shootSpell()
      like shootHeel() shoots BossSpell attacks at hero using positioning() method every 1-2,9s

    • itWalks

      public void itWalks()
      randomises boss' movement changing speed, gravity scale and applying jump; each change is controlled by random number generator and timer. Has no constraints as to what is the maximum or minimum speed.
      Overrides:
      itWalks in class Enemy

    • wonBoss

      public void wonBoss()
      method controls moving to the next level upon winning the fight
      See Also:
      game, GameLevels

    • setLollipopCount

      public void setLollipopCount​(int i)
      Specified by:
      setLollipopCount in class Enemy
